mapper.insert: insert into sys_role (ROLE_ID, ROLE_NAME, REMARK, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF) values (#{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update sys_role set ROLE_NAME = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ROLE_ID, ROLE_NAME, REMARK, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF from sys_role
